class Decompressor
extends java.io.InputStream

Decompresses a stream.

Field Summary

(package private) static int[] tree
          Decompression Table This is a static huffman tree that is walked down for decompression, negative nodes are final values (and 0), positive nodes point to other nodes if drawn this tree is sorted from up to down (layer by layer) and left to right.
(package private)  int treepos
          Current position in the tree
